summary.span: Represents a collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如前所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全所述但， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能考量，複製，而且進行安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements**oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements* 一或多個宣告使用物件項目語法的物件。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
